name: Mars 2.0
description:
This is my first  project as a Game Development student and I hope you enjoy playing it as much I did making it!

Watch out flying rocks and especially those fire ones. Gravity? Yeah I know! We don't know how those rocks can float in the air. Kinda mystery to solve.  We need you to collect glowing stones, so that we can explore this planet and solve the mystery. 

Good luck!

  • Play with one button: "Space" = Get some boost to your rocket!
  • Short but also endlessly replayable
  • Just a tiny touch of retro vibes

This is the first version, work in progress.

If you have any thoughts or questions about this game, leave me a message. I appreciate that, thank you!
